name: 形式幂级数复合与复合逆
complexity: O(M(n) log n) for composition and compositional inverse using Kinoshita–Li algorithm, where M(n) is polynomial multiplication time (usually O(n log n) with FFT).
scenarios: Computing f(g(x)) mod x^n for formal power series f and g.
Finding compositional inverse g(x) such that f(g(x)) ≡ g(f(x)) ≡ x (mod x^n).
Implementing polynomial functions like exp, log, power via composition.
Solving combinatorial enumeration problems using Lagrange inversion.
extensions: Power projection problem: computing [x^(n-1)] P(x,y)/Q(x,y) mod y^m.
Kronecker substitution for bivariate polynomial multiplication.
